text: Arif-ur-Rehman Alvi (; born 29 August 1949) is a Pakistani politician. He was the 13th President of Pakistan from 9 September 2018 until 10 March 2024. He was a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan from June 2013 to May 2018 and again from August to September 2018. He was a founding member of Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI). Alvi was elected as President of Pakistan on 4 September 2018 following the presidential election. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Pakistan Category:Current national leaders Category:Politicians from Karachi
title: Arif Alvi
